pkgmetadata.longdescription: This is a Chinese open source font based on IPAmj Ming Dynasty. It is an attempt to transform Japanese writing fonts into mainland Chinese standard writing. This font is the sister font of "Xiawu Xinxihei". It attempts to transform it into the standard font of mainland China based on the original font of "IPAmj Ming Dynasty". In addition, the Greek letters and Cyrillic letters have been redone, and the style is basically consistent with the Latin letters of the original font, which is more suitable for the typesetting of modern Greek and Cyrillic; new display support for Vietnamese Latin characters has been added. In terms of symbols, it supports special symbols such as I Ching Bagua and Sixty-four Hexagram symbols, Taixuan Jing Eighty-one Hexagram symbols, Mahjong symbols, Chinese chess symbols, arithmetic numbers, and "正" character counting.

这是一款基于 IPAmj明朝 的中文开源字体，是将日本写法的字体改造成中国大陆 规范写法的尝试。 本字体是「霞鹜新晰黑」的姊妹字体，尝试在「IPAmj明朝」原有字形的基础上， 将其改造成中国大陆规范字形。除此之外，重做了希腊字母和西里尔字母，与 原字体拉丁字母部分风格基本一致，更适合现代希腊文及西里尔文的排版； 新增对越南语拉丁字的显示支持。符号方面，支持易经八卦和六十四卦符号、 太玄经八十一卦符号、麻将符号、中国象棋符号、算筹数字、「正」字计数等 特殊符号。
